title: First Preview of Goldbarre
content: Greater Albion has just published a preview of a forthcoming release on it's [Blog](http://web.archive.org/web/20100202230147/http:/gatf.wordpress.com/). Goldbarre is an all capitals face in a 1920s industrial style, with engraved shading.
author: Rasendyll

comments.content:
Blimey, how many fonts do you release each week?

Nick Cooke
Nick, We aim at about one a week, though we're lagging behid at the moment :)
